title: If you like this preseason you are getting trashtalked
body:
This is the boards mentality , you can't express your oppinion, you can't talk shit to these people. If you say you have fun you get downvoted. If you say I like X because Y you get downvoted. Lissandra passive, turret plating who gives a shit about these good things? Let's talk from our lvl 8 account how this game is dying while my main account is lvl 200 and currently in game.

All of you who complain about everything and are never satisfied , FUCK OFF.

_A very pissed player that loves this game._
